name: Drunk Dan
description:
Drunk Dan is a single-player game featuring Dan as the main character. He wakes up in his house, drunk and eager to drink more. However, his wife will be coming home any minute and he must fix the house appliances and try not to puke or pass out by maintaining his alcohol level.

This game was an entry at Global Game Jam 2020. It was produced in 46 hours by a team of 6 people.

Credits to:

Alexandru Slav, Andrei Dumbravescu, Dragos Liche, Loredana Slav, Mircea Lazar
